Name: Habanero
Ingredients: 1 slice Red chili pepper (jalape√±o/fresno chili (10,000 SHU) deseeded) fine sliced
60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger and chilli in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine-strain into chilled glass.
Review: A Daiquiri-style drink with honey, ginger and chilli.
History: Created in 2008 by Giuliano Morandin at The Bar at The Dorchester Hotel, Hotel, London, England.
